verses.text: \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Dan \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* unto \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* received \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w lot|strong="H5307"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* stock \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Saraa \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Esthaol, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w spy|strong="H7270"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* view \w it|strong="H8033"\w* diligently: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* view \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*. \w They|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Michas, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* rested \w there|strong="H8033"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* knowing \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* lodging \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee hither? \w what|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w here|strong="H6311"\w*? \w why|strong="H4100"\w* wouldst thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* hither?

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: Michas hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* hath \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w desired|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w consult|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* whether \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w thing|strong="H4994"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* effect.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H1870"\w*: Go \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* looketh \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* go.

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Lais: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* fear, \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w custom|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, \w secure|strong="H0982"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* easy, \w having|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* oppose \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, being very rich, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* separated, \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Sidon \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w returned|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Saraa \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Esthaol, \w who|strong="H0251"\w* \w asked|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w had|strong="H0935"\w* done? \w to|strong="H0413"\w* whom \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* rich \w and|strong="H0935"\w* fruitful: neglect \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, lose \w no|strong="H0408"\w* time: \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* difficulty.

\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w secure|strong="H0982"\w*, \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w spacious|strong="H7342"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* groweth \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0376"\w* therefore \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* kindred \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Dan, \w to|strong="H0376"\w* wit, \w from|strong="H5265"\w* Saraa \w and|strong="H3967"\w* Esthaol, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, furnished \w with|strong="H0376"\w* arms \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* lodged \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Cariathiarim \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Juda: \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Dan, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* Cariathiarim.

\w From|strong="H0935"\w* thence \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H2022"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Michas,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H6258"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* view \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Lais, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* theraphim, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* molten \w god|strong="H0559"\w*: \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* pleased \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H0935"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* little \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \w who|strong="H3881"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Michas: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* saluted \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* words \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* before \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, appointed \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* arms.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* young \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* god, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* theraphim, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* molten god, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* before \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* valiant \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w waiting|strong="H5324"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* far \w off|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* thing, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w idols|strong="H8655"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* molten \w god|strong="H0559"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w Hold|strong="H1004"\w* thy peace \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* thy finger \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* we \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*. \w Whether|strong="H0176"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

\w When|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* heard \w this|strong="H0935"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* agreed \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* words, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w idols|strong="H8655"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w god|strong="H3190"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w departed|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H6437"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H6440"\w* going \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* all \w that|strong="H6437"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* valuable,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* now \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w distance|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Michas, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Michas \w gathering|strong="H1692"\w* \w together|strong="H2199"\w* followed \w them|strong="H1992"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* began \w to|strong="H0413"\w* shout \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* looked \w back|strong="H5437"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Michas: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* aileth thee? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* aileth thee?
